snippet: John W. Butler Jr., a partner at the law firm Skadden, Arps, Slate, Meagher & Flom, will move to Hilco Global, a financial firm whose services include liquidating bankrupt companies,
abstract: John W. Butler Jr., a partner at the law firm Skadden, Arps, Slate, Meagher & Flom, will move to Hilco Global, a financial firm whose services include liquidating bankrupt companies,

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Jack Butler, a Top Bankruptcy Lawyer, Will Move to Hilco
